title: Pet Peeves & Quirks

questions.text: When my partner has a habit that's a little annoying, I usually...
choices: Find it kind of endearing honestly
Mention it gently and hope they adjust
Let it go - nobody's perfect
Tease them about it playfully
Other / It depends

questions.text: Something small that I find surprisingly important is...
choices: How the kitchen/bathroom is kept
Being on time vs running late
Noise levels and quiet time
How we share or divide space
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to tidiness and organization, I'd say I'm...
choices: Pretty neat - I like things in their place
Organized chaos - I know where my stuff is
Relaxed - mess doesn't really bother me
It depends on my mood and energy
Other / It depends

questions.text: A quirky thing about me that you might have to accept is...
choices: I have specific ways I like things done
I can be forgetful about little things
I need things to be tidy to feel calm
I'm not great at putting things back where they belong
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we notice each other's quirks, I hope we...
choices: Laugh about them and accept them
Gently help each other improve
Pick our battles - some things aren't worth mentioning
Appreciate that quirks make us who we are
Other / It depends

description: Discover the little quirks that make you, you.
